original_title: Death of Dinesh Schaffter: Court calls for Govt. Analyst’s reports
original_body_lines: The Colombo Chief Magistrate's Court today issued an order directing the CID to obtain the Government Analyst's reports on the productions referred to him by court regarding the investigations into the death of businessman Dinesh Schaffer.

Colombo Additional Magistrate Rajindra Jayasuriya observed that the court is yet to receive the analytical reports pertaining to the case productions including several blood samples which have already been referred to the Government Analyst.
The Additional Magistrate ordered the CID to take necessary steps to obtain these reports from the Government Analyst.
Meanwhile, the Additional Magistrate said there is a posibility of sending a reminder to the Government Analyst about these reports, if necessary.

The body of businessman Dinesh Shaffter was recently exhumed in the presence of a panel of medical experts who were appointed to perform a fresh post mortem inquiry to ascertain the cause of death. (Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
